scripts.prepare: mkdir -p outputs witnesses ceremonies keys verifiers proofs contracts
scripts.witness: circom multiplier2.circom --wasm --r1cs -o outputs/ && node outputs/multiplier2_js/generate_witness.js outputs/multiplier2_js/multiplier2.wasm inputs/multiplier2.json witnesses/multiplier2.wtns
scripts.ceremony: snarkjs powersoftau new bn128 12 ceremonies/pot12_0000.ptau -v && snarkjs powersoftau contribute ceremonies/pot12_0000.ptau ceremonies/pot12_0001.ptau --name="First contribution" -v && snarkjs powersoftau prepare phase2 ceremonies/pot12_0001.ptau ceremonies/pot12_final.ptau -v && snarkjs groth16 setup outputs/multiplier2.r1cs ceremonies/pot12_final.ptau keys/multiplier2_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute keys/multiplier2_0000.zkey keys/multiplier2_0001.zkey --name="1st Contributor Name" -v && snarkjs zkey export verificationkey keys/multiplier2_0001.zkey verifiers/verification_key.json && snarkjs groth16 prove keys/multiplier2_0001.zkey witnesses/multiplier2.wtns proofs/multiplier2.json proofs/multiplier2_public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify verifiers/verification_key.json proofs/multiplier2_public.json proofs/multiplier2.json
scripts.solidity: snarkjs zkey export solidityverifier keys/multiplier2_0001.zkey contracts/multiplier2_verifier.sol
scripts.all: yarn run prepare && yarn run witness && yarn run ceremony && yarn run verify && yarn run solidity
